input.prompt: A porcelain ceramic figure of a man wearing a vintage baseball cap, seated at a desk with a retro computer setup, coding intently on a mechanical keyboard. The man has a smooth porcelain-white texture with subtle glaze. The desk features a CRT monitor with authentic yellow-green phosphor glow and distinctive bright #F7ED4A highlights illuminating the visible code text, wooden surface, mechanical keyboard, and vintage accessories. The desk includes humanizing playful touches: a small potted succulent plant in a geometric patterned pot, and a coffee mug with a gentle smile illustration. The overall mood balances focused professional work with warmth and approachability, making coding look enjoyable and human-centered. Warm ambient lighting from above creates soft shadows on the porcelain figure, with yellow-green monitor glow adding secondary illumination. 3D render style, photorealistic ceramic material texture, editorial product photography aesthetic, warm inviting color grading with yellow-green tones, rich depth of field.

changes_from_draft_01.added_yellow_monitor_glow: CRT monitor now features yellow-green phosphor with #F7ED4A highlights
changes_from_draft_01.added_playful_elements: Succulent plant and smiling mug added to desk
changes_from_draft_01.enhanced_emotional_tone: Scene now emphasizes warmth, approachability alongside professionalism
changes_from_draft_01.maintained_request_fulfillment: All core elements unchanged - figure, cap, retro setup, coding activity
